refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the contents of a file within the tar/zip to those of an external file or string

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
localName
The filename (relative path) to modify in a tar or zip archive.
value
Content of the file.

&reftitle.errors;
Throws PharException if there are any problems flushing changes made to the tar/zip archive to disk.
